name: Dream
public_notice: Dream has recently migrated from their old contract to a new one. For more information, please visit this post.
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

The following token has a variable tax function on the smart contract to change tax rates post deployment.
Do your own research and be careful if you are trading this token.

description.en: Dream is an ERC-20 protocol that aims to disrupt the Crypto space by offering investors and partners regulated market hours that mirror the New York Stock Exchange. We will start with the $DREAM token, which is a premium utility asset that follows the stock market hours trading mechanism. $DREAM will serve as the bedrock on which we build protocol, initiatives and foundation.
